operations.description: Allows an admin to get a summary report for an individual User.
Allows an admin to get a filtered list of user accounts

parameters.name: start_index
parameters.description: Starting index for results. Results are limited to a maximum of 100.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The User's id, if this is supplied, other filters are ignored.

parameters.name: contact_point_contains
parameters.description: Narrows down to users with matching Contact Points value. (e.g. +33612345678)

parameters.name: place_contains
parameters.description: Narrows down to users with matching Place,(e.g. Paris, Winchester, 20 High Street.)

parameters.name: postal_address_contains
parameters.description: Narrows down to users with matching Postal Address (e.g. Paris, Winchester, 20 High Street.)

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Narrows down to users with matching First Name

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Narrows down to users with matching Last Name

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Narrows down to users with a specific activation state (activated, deactivated or suspended).

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Lists results in a specific order ('alpha' for alphabetic order, 'most_active' for ordering by activity inside Libon, 'least_active for the opposite order')

parameters.name: keep
parameters.description: Includes accounts that have been kept after deletion.

apis.description:
Rest operations regarding password manipulation
Authorized characters for password:
  • all digits from 0 to 9,
  • all letters from a to z in lower and upper case,
  • others:
    • _ (underscore)
    • . (dot)
    • ; (semi column)
    • ! (exclamation mark)
    • - (dash)

operations.description: Request for a password reset, providing an identifier for the notification message. operations.description: This call enables one or more Contacts to be rapidly moved to one or more Profiles. The Contacts are removed from any Profile that they were previously assigned to.

The Move call reassigns a contact from one profile to another. The contact will now see the contact points associated with the new profile and lose any contact points from the previous profile that are not on the profile the contact is moved to.
